CREATE TABLE if not exists customer ( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, surname varchar NOT NULL, name varchar, phone varchar, telegram_name varchar, mail varchar );
CREATE TABLE if not exists account ( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, customer_id int NOT NULL, deposit int NOT NULL, full_cost int NOT NULL, refund int, purchase_date date NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer (id) );
